name: JCommerce
description:
JCommerce is a modern IT consulting and software company, which provides its clients with professional software development services. Having been active on the IT market since 2005 and utilizing the long-term experience of its employees, JCommerce offers dedicated applications for web, mobile, and desktop, and advanced solutions in the field of Business Intelligence, ERP, Enterprise Mobility Management and Software Testing.
JCommerce offers the knowledge and skills of nearly 400 IT developers, consultants, IT architects and QA engineers, working at our offices or on-site at customer premises. The company also implements Managed Services - managing business applications in the IT environment, providing maintenance and technological support. It assumes responsibility for security and scalability. Our clients include both the largest companies in Poland as well as foreign and international companies.
JCommerce is a partner of leading software and hardware producers – Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, Qlik Solution Provider, Jamf Silver Partner and Direct Partner of Dell. The technologies used in projects are among the world‘s leading solutions in their respective classes, as confirmed by the results of independent studies conducted by Gartner Inc. and Forrester Research Inc.
Our skills and technology:
PHP / JAVA / .Net / PLC / HMI Business Intelligence / Quality Assurance / Microsoft Dynamics / Mobile Development / Front-End / Business Analysis / Big Data
Our services:
IT specialist outsourcing / Project Outsourcing / Managed Services / Quality Assurance / Software Testing / Outsourcing development
READ MORE...
